recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the waffle iron and grease. Whisk together the dry ingredients - flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.

In another bowl, beat the eggs until light and fluffy. Add the vanilla to the egg mixture, then combine with dry ingredients. Add the butter and milk, blending just until smooth. Let sit for 5 minutes before cooking.
Pour onto hot iron and cook until golden brown.
